name: DLVR: An OSR Adaptation of BOLT
name_original: DLVR: An OSR Adaptation of BOLT
description:
DLVR (pronounced “Delver”) is an OSR (“Old-School Renaissance”) adaptation of the BOLT RPG Engine. That rules text is the only document required to play this game, and from there, DLVR is an open toolbox for any OSR adventure you and your gaming table seek to approach.

With art and layout from Johan Nohr (artist and graphic designer of Mörk Borg), DLVR is a new approach to OSR roleplaying, stripping characters down to a Skill list and tying advancement to living to tell the tales of your adventures.
